Home » 40P15 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
52 Dvigocchaka, Kusalattika
Dvigocchaka, Kusalattika
61.
171Noupādānaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādāno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate ekaṃ.
172Upādānaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca noupādāno naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
173Nokilesaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ…pe…  avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
